snippet.title: Badland \- Review
snippet.description:
Badland \- Review
4 Apr 2013 by charlesbattersby on charlesbattersby charlesbattersby.wordpress.com/2013/04/04/badland-review/
Badland might be crammed into the category of an “Autorunner”, the genre of gaming … that flies, and players have to tap the screen of the iPhone to flap its wings and keep it afloat. It’s an “Autoflapper” if … even begin to describe this unusual and engrossing game from the two-man team of Frogmind Games. Continue …
